ships.name: I.R.W. Vrax
ships.text: If you reveal a 4 [forward] maneuver, immediately before you move, you may change it to a 4 Bank maneuver. Treat this as a Red Maneuver.

captains.name: Suran
captains.text: ACTION: When attacking this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step, if you are within range 1 of a friendly ship, set 1 of your attack dice on the result of your choice. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled.

captains.name: Velal
captains.text: ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

admirals.name: Velal
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

upgrades.name: Coordinated Attack
upgrades.text:
If your ship has not already attacked this round, you may discard this card to perform an attack with your Primary Weapon at -1 attack dice immediately after a friendly ship attacks, regardless of initiative order.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Romulan Captain on a Romulan ship.

upgrades.name: Bridge Officer
upgrades.text:
When you are instructed to place Time Tokens on one of your [weapon] Upgrades, place 1 less Time Token than required.

This Upgrade costs +2 SP for any non-Romulan ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Bridge Officer Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Tal'aura
upgrades.text: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 3. Discard 1 [crew] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

upgrades.name: Photon Torpedoes
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and place 3 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack.

You may convert 1 of your [battlestations] results into 1 [crit] result.
You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

upgrades.name: Plasma Torpedoes
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and place 3 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack.

You may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

upgrades.name: Flanking Attack
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: Discard this card to perform this attack.
The defending ship rolls -1 defense die against this attack.
You may only fire this weapon from your forward firing arc and you may only perform this attack if your ship is not within the forward or rear firing arc of the defending ship.
